Coins Problem

British Coins
================
coins = [1,2,5,10,20,50]
target = 1
expectedResult = 1, [1]

target = 3
expectedResult = 2, [2,1]

target = 5
expectedResult 1, [5]

target = 9
expectedResult = 3, [5,2,2]

target = 11
expectedResult = 2, [10,1]

target = 23
expectedResult = 3, [20,2,1]

target = 49
expectedResult = 5, [20,20,5,2,2]

target = 87
expectedResult = 5, [50,20,10,5,2]

Lilliputian Coins
=======================
coins = [1,4,15,20,50]
target = 3
expectedResult = 3, [1,1,1]

target = 10
expectedResult = 4, [4,4,1,1]

target = 23
expectedResult = 3, [15,4,4]

target = 32
expectedResult = 4, [15,15,1,1]
